about.title: About me
about.description: Fullstack Systems Analyst with 3+ years of experience in developing scalable, high-performance applications. Proven track record in large-scale projects, including Google partnership for educational solutions development (SENAI, SESI, CNI) handling 30-50k monthly active users. Engineered gamified corporate engagement platform deployed by Wizard, Mercado Livre, and Nivea, achieving up to 70% productivity increase. Financial sector experience (BTG Pactual) in critical systems maintenance and integration analysis. Familiarity with microservices architectures, cloud environments (AWS/Azure), and agile methodologies.
about.hardSkills: Java | Spring Boot | Kotlin | Node | React | PostgreSQL | MySQL | MongoDB | Docker | AWS | Azure | Git | GitHub | Scrum | ITIL v4
